events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. The recruitment team will review your details shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically targeting the Software Developer role in our tech division.
A dedicated recruiter named Sarah Johnson has been assigned to assist you throughout the hiring process for the software engineering role.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background, experience, and motivations for applying to our software engineering team.
Thank you for your prompt response and enthusiasm. We appreciate your detailed answers during the screening and your eagerness to proceed.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7, 2024 at 10:00 AM UTC with our lead developer to discuss coding challenges and system design.
